recipes.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions. Heat olive oil in a pan, add onions and garlic, sauté until softened. Add ground beef, cook until browned. Pour in canned tomatoes, season with salt and pepper, and simmer for 15 minutes. Serve sauce over spaghetti, topped with Parmesan cheese.

recipes.name: Pancakes
recipes.instructions: In a bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, and salt. Add eggs and milk, and whisk until smooth. Heat butter in a pan, pour in batter to form pancakes, and cook until golden on both sides. Serve with toppings of choice.

recipes.name: Caesar Salad
recipes.instructions: Chop romaine lettuce and place in a large bowl. Add grilled chicken slices, croutons, and Parmesan cheese. Drizzle with Caesar dressing and toss to combine.

recipes.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C. Cream butter and sugar together, then add the egg and mix well. Stir in flour, baking powder, salt, and chocolate chips. Drop spoonfuls of dough onto a baking sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes.

recipes.name: Omelette
recipes.instructions: Beat eggs in a bowl with salt and pepper. Melt butter in a pan, pour in the eggs, and cook until edges set. Add cheese and any other fillings, fold in half, and cook until cheese melts.
